PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-10932015-07-16,  PS,  ,  , 
ActRoyal Canadian Mounted Police Act
SubjectPolicing Services in Nova Scotia
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, on behalf of the Government of Canada, to enter into an ARRANGEMENT with NOVA SCOTIA for the use or employment of the ROYAL CANADIAN MOUNTED POLICE in aiding in the administration of justice at the Halifax Robert L. Stanfield International Airport.
AttachmentsAttachment
